title: Bardaha
text:
Bardaha is a village in <a href="Hilauli">Hilauli</a> block of <a href="Unnao%20district">Unnao district</a>, <a href="Uttar%20Pradesh">Uttar Pradesh</a>, <a href="India">India</a>. As of 2011, its population is 2,529, in 469 households, and it has one primary school and no healthcare facilities.
The <a href="1961%20Census%20of%20India">1961 census</a> recorded Bardaha as comprising 5 hamlets, with a total population of 1,086 (556 male and 530 female), in 210 households and 152 physical houses. The area of the village was given as 1,183 <a href="acre">acre</a>s.
